# The iconv extension

Configure the `iconv` extension.

This extension provides support for interface to iconv character set conversion
facility.

## EXT_ICONV

* Default: `ON`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## EXT_ICONV_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
